001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import java.util.function.Supplier;
004
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor;
006import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
007import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
008
009import com.technototes.library.general.Invertable;
010import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
011
012/** Class for motors
013 * @author Alex Stedman
014 * @param <T> The qualcomm hardware device interface
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("unused")
017public class Motor<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends HardwareDevice<T>
018        implements Invertable<Motor<T>>, Supplier<Double> {
019    private boolean invert = false;
020    private double min = -1, max = 1;
021    /** Create a motor
022     *
023     * @param device The hardware device
024     */
025    public Motor(T device) {
026        super(device);
027    }
028
029    /** Create a motor
030     *
031     * @param deviceName The device name
032     */
033    public Motor(String deviceName) {
034        super(deviceName);
035    }
036
037    public Motor<T> setLimits(double mi, double ma) {
038        min = Range.clip(mi, -1, 1);
039        max = Range.clip(ma, -1, 1);
040        return this;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public boolean getInverted() {
045        return invert;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public Motor<T> setInverted(boolean inv) {
050        getDevice().setDirection(inv ? DcMotorSimple.Direction.FORWARD : DcMotorSimple.Direction.REVERSE);
051        invert = inv;
052        return this;
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public Motor<T> invert() {
057        return setInverted(!getInverted());
058    }
059
060    public double getSpeed() {
061        return device.getPower();
062    }
063
064    /** Set speed of motor
065     *
066     * @param speed The speed of the motor
067     */
068    public void setSpeed(double speed) {
069        device.setPower(Range.clip(speed, min, max));
070    }
071
072    public Motor<T> brake() {
073        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotor)
074            ((DcMotor) getDevice()).setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior.BRAKE);
075        return this;
076    }
077
078    public Motor<T> coast() {
079        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotor)
080            ((DcMotor) getDevice()).setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior.FLOAT);
081        return this;
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public Double get() {
086        return getSpeed();
087    }
088}
